slide3.title: A Point of View in Every Space

about.title: About Aigerim Akhmetova
about.quote: From Concept to Cover: The Art of Honoring & Amplifying Every Interior's Unique Story
about.p_1_text: My passion for transforming spaces began with a foundation in Arts and Architecture. I bring 4 years of experience in interior design and 3 years specializing in interior photography and styling, collaborating closely with leading photographers and designers. To date, I have styled and directed 200+ interior shoots. This experience has led to numerous international publications in Architectural Digest, ELLE Decoration, New York Times, House & Garden and more.
about.p_2_text: My mission is to help every project reach its highest visual potential and gain global recognition.
about.em_1_text: I believe every interior has a story to tell and it deserves to be expressed with precision and beauty. Let’s connect!

subtitle.first: Let’s take a closer look at the transformation.
subtitle.second: Where subtle changes create a powerful shift.

header.line2: Whether you have a question, a styling project or just want to connect. I’m always excited to hear from you

services.legend: Which service(s) are you looking for?
